metaTitle: 108 Leonard apartments building for sale | Team.
metaDescription: Meet the whole team that makes these apartments a luxury place to live.

slides.title: DESIGN
slides.subtitle: Interiors designed by Jeffrey Beers International
slides.para: Jeffery Beers International (JBI) brings experience, vision, and architectural precision to the creation of vibrant social spaces. Internationally recognized as a leader in architecture and design, JBI is a full service studio founded by Jeffrey Beers in 1986. JBI's team of talented and highly trained designers have collaborated with exceptional clients to push the boundaries of design, advancing the hospitality industry through a portfolio of award-winning projects, including the Cove at the Atlantis Resort in Paradise Island, the Bahamas, The 40/40 Club, The Plaza Food Hall in New York City and the Fontainebleau Resort in Miami.

slides.title: Development
slides.subtitle:
Sponsored by C3GBLLC
Managed by Elad Group
slides.para: With several billion dollars in assets, Elad Group is one of the nation's leading real estate companies, known and recognized worldwide for the history-making, restoration and conversion of the famed Plaza Hotel. Elad's New York portfolio of iconic buildings includes 22 Central Park South, an exquisite collection of luxury residences overlooking Central Park, and 250 West Street, a 1906 warehouse turned luxury condominium in TriBeCa. On the West Coast, Elad also developed The Carlyle Residences along L.A.'s coveted Wilshire Corridor.
